other_tests.findings: Elevated plasma 7-dehydrocholesterol level of 5.9 mg/dl (normal 0.005â€“0.015 mg/dl); low cholesterol level at 117 mg/dl (age-matched mean 172 mg/dl).
other_tests.changes_over_time: At the 1- and 2-year follow-ups, plasma cholesterol increased from 117 mg/dl (initial evaluation) to 177 mg/dl and 140 mg/dl, respectively; 7-dehydrocholesterol level remained relatively constant at 6.2 and 6.6 mg/dl.

other_tests.findings: Mild generalized slowing with right- and left-side parietal occipital spike-wave discharges.
